poem:
Title: In Search of Artistry

Oscars, those gleaming statuettes,
paint a gilded canvas of vanity,
yet, through the murk of mediocrity,
arises The Zone of Interest.
Britain and Poland unite,
under Glazer's craftful sight,
cuisines of culture, over the plain night,
provoking the mind's restless quest.
Worthy of stardom's flinty mantle?
Time's discerning chisel shall rightly test.
